projects.name: Restaurant Reservation System

projects.name: Movie Theater API
projects.description: RESTful CRUD API for fetching movie theaters and their available movie showings.

projects.name: Flashcard Study Suite
projects.description: Website for deck management and flashcard study.

projects.name: Discord Chatbot
projects.description: Discord live chatbot for responding to user input, server management, and webhook notifications.
